questions.questionText: Over the past week, how often have you felt overwhelmed or unable to cope with your emotions and responsibilities?
How often do you experience feelings of sadness or hopelessness that affect your daily life?
To what extent do you feel anxious or worried about various aspects of your life, such as school, friendships, or family?
How frequently do you find it challenging to concentrate or stay focused on tasks?
How often do you struggle with low self-esteem or feelings of worthlessness?
How many times in the last week have you experienced physical symptoms related to stress, such as headaches, stomachaches, or muscle tension?
To what extent do you feel isolated or disconnected from others, even when surrounded by friends or family?
How often do you experience disruptions in your sleep patterns, such as trouble falling asleep or waking up frequently during the night?
How frequently do you engage in activities or hobbies that bring you joy and relaxation?
To what extent do you feel comfortable discussing your emotions and mental health with someone you trust, such as a friend, family member, or counselor?
